name: Snowball Saves Summer
description: Play as Snowball in this 2D physics platformer. Rescue the kidnapped Snow Queen, and stop the North Pole from melting during the hottest summer ever!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+, 7, 8, 10 Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5 2.3GHz or above Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 300 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+, 7, 8, 10 Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7 2.6GHz or above Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 960M DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 300 MB available space
